name: Kazan City Day
description: Celebrate the anniversary of Kazan's founding with parades and festivities.

name: Kazan International Festival of Muslim Cinema
description: Enjoy screenings of films from around the Muslim world.

name: Kazan Summer Music Festival
description: Experience concerts and performances by local and international artists.

name: Kazan Marathon
description: Join thousands of runners in the annual Kazan Marathon.

name: Kazan International Fireworks Festival
description: Experience spectacular fireworks displays from around the world.

name: Kazan International Food Festival
description: Indulge in a variety of cuisines from different cultures at the Kazan Food Festival.

name: Kazan Winter Wonderland
description: Enjoy winter activities and festive decorations in Kazan's city center.

name: Kazan International Arts and Crafts Fair
description: Browse and purchase unique handmade crafts and artworks at the Kazan Arts and Crafts Fair.

name: Kazan International Dance Festival
description: Witness captivating dance performances by talented artists from around the world.

name: Kazan Cultural Heritage Week
description: Explore Kazan's rich cultural heritage through exhibitions, workshops, and performances.
